game.name: Spee
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A World War I strategy game where you command fleets, manage trade and logistics, and fight for dominance across 50 colonial ports.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A World War I strategy game where you command fleets, manage trade and logistics, and fight for dominance across 50 colonial ports.
